name: Chad's Drunken Stutter
description:
This is the 1st game I ever made.

I was hesitant to release it since it is incorrectly formatted and gets a bit grindy at the end, but still, I kinda need to to get it to work.

I need to run it through RPG maker XP to format it, except I can't since I made this in 30 days using a free trial off the official website.

Donate pls to fix the game and if you HAVE RPG maker XP, feel free to play it too.
